item.description:
We're getting close to the Fall of 2011.  Help send off Summer with a blast and welcome the down side of the calendar with a wine tasting event at Ralph's house in Cheshire on Saturday, September 17 th 6-10 pm.

For wine night, everyone will bring a bottle of wine (no boxed wine or 1.75MLs please) AND a pot luck dish, finger food, hors d'oeuvres or desert.  One group is setting up a fondue station so you can bring stuff to dunk in the cheese.  Please indicate what food item
you want to bring when you sign up. If you are coming by yourself or don't want to go in with someone just bring a bottle of wine that is $15 or more with your dish. Couples or groups can go in together on a bottle that is $30 or more depending on the quantity of people in the group, to ensure we have a good assortment of wines to taste.  Get some different types of wine so we have a varied taste testing.

  Reds - Malbec, Blends, cab, merlot, shiraz pinot noir.
Whites - sav blanc, chards, reisling, pinot grigio, etc
Please ensure you show up if you RSVP yes, since we may have a waiting list and you are taking up a persons spot if you do not show up.  If you must cancel, the earlier the better if there is a waiting list.  
*Please note* The address will be sent a few days prior to the event if you don't have it already to all the "yes" RSVPs, due to this being a private residence. It should go without saying to Drink Responsibly. I will have water and coffee too.   This is for 4 meetup groups and set at 20 people each.  Only sign up on one site if you belong to more than one for an accurate count.   See you there.
